content:
On March 28, 2024, an extraordinary meeting of the NATO Council was held at the NATO Council at the NATO headquarters, convened at the initiative of the Ukrainian side in connection with Russia's missile attacks by Ukrainian critical infrastructure.

This is stated inmessageNATO missions of Ukraine.

The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov informed allies about the consequences of Russian attacks, as well as about response measures taken by Ukraine.

"NATO member states have called for additional air defense systems and missiles to protect Ukrainian cities and citizens," the statement said.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Russians of the Russians by aircraft on Kharkivqualifiedas evidence of genocide.
title: There was an extraordinary meeting of the Council of Ukraine - NATO: Rustem Umerov appealed to the Allies
description: This is stated in the message of the mission of Ukraine with NATO. Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem ...
